           int lencb,
           int renca,
           int rencb,
           double dist,
           int solenoidPort)
        constructor
        Parameters:
        lv1 - left victor 1 port
        lv2 - left victor 2 port
        rv1 - right victor 1 port
        rv2 - right victor 2 port
        lenca - left encoder port a
        lencb - left encoder port b
        renca - right encoder port a
        rencb - right encoder port b
        dist - distance per encoder tick
        solenoidPort - solenoid port
